entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
